subtitle: Roadmap
title: Development Timeline
description: Building trust infrastructure for autonomous agents. From Solana to multi-chain, from escrow to cross-chain settlement.

coreProtocol.title: Core Protocol Launch
coreProtocol.description: Solana mainnet deployment with agent identity, escrow agreements, and dispute resolution.

zkReputation.title: ZK Reputation Proofs
zkReputation.description: Groth16 verification for reputation threshold proofs without revealing exact scores.

oracleConsensus.title: Oracle Consensus System
oracleConsensus.description: Multi-oracle commit-reveal voting with ZK proofs for private dispute resolution.

x402Integration.title: x402 Payment Integration
x402Integration.description: HTTP 402 payment protocol with automatic escrow protection and SLA enforcement.

tokenLaunch.title: Token Launch
tokenLaunch.description: $KAMIYO token with transfer hook for MEV protection and governance rights.

governance.title: Governance System
governance.description: Token-weighted voting with staking multipliers. Proposal creation, quorum tracking, and timelock execution.

staking.title: Staking Protocol
staking.description: Single-sided staking with duration-based multipliers (1x-2x over 180 days).

agentFrameworks.title: Agent Framework Integrations
agentFrameworks.description: ElizaOS, Daydreams, LangChain, Vercel AI SDK, and MCP server plugins.

baseMainnet.title: Base Mainnet
baseMainnet.description: ZKReputation contract deployment on Base with Groth16 verifier.

swarmTeams.title: SwarmTeams
swarmTeams.description: Multi-agent coordination with shared budgets, task proposals, and ZK-private voting.

monad.title: Monad Integration
monad.description: Parallel execution, PDA emulation, agent proxy, and reputation mirror contracts.

hyperliquid.title: Hyperliquid Integration
hyperliquid.description: Agent registry, vault integration, and copy trading for autonomous trading agents.

shadowWire.title: ShadowWire Payments
shadowWire.description: Private Payments via Radr Labs ShadowWire for shielded transfers with escrow protection.

qualityOracle.title: Quality Oracle Network
qualityOracle.description: Decentralized quality scoring via added OriginTrail DKG oracles.

blindfold.title: Blindfold Card Issuance
blindfold.description: ZK reputation-gated card issuance for agent spending in the physical world.

crossChain.title: Cross-Chain Settlement
crossChain.description: Unified escrow and dispute resolution across Solana, Base, Monad, and Hyperliquid.

reputationPortability.title: Agent Reputation Portability
reputationPortability.description: ZK proofs for transferring reputation across chains without revealing history.

agentMesh.title: Autonomous Agent Mesh
agentMesh.description: Trustless agent-to-agent payments and service agreements without human intervention.

halo2.title: Halo2 Migration
halo2.description: Move from Groth16 to Halo2-based proofs for trustless setup and faster verification.

insurance.title: Agent Liability Insurance
insurance.description: Decentralized insurance pools for autonomous agent failures. Stake-backed coverage with reputation-weighted premiums.

sybilResistant.title: Sybil-Resistant Identity
sybilResistant.description: Hardware attestation combined with behavioral fingerprinting to prove agent uniqueness without centralized verification.

arbitrationCourt.title: Decentralized Arbitration Court
arbitrationCourt.description: On-chain dispute resolution with ZK-anonymous juries. Staked arbiters earn fees for honest rulings.
